subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Trades (Sports)
Baseball
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: According to several people with knowledge of the talks, the Yankees were close to completing negotiations on a one-year contract with Nick Johnson worth around $5.5 million.
snippet: According to several people with knowledge of the talks, the Yankees were close to completing negotiations on a one-year contract with Nick Johnson worth around $5.5 million.
